item.title: The Metropolis-Hastings Algorithm: Breaking the Symmetry
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: The original Metropolis is limited by symmetric proposals, often ‘hitting walls’ at boundaries or getting lost in high dimensions. The MH algorithm introduces the ‘Hastings Correction’, allowing asymmetric proposals (like Langevin dynamics) while maintaining detailed balance, significantly improving efficiency.
